Metadata.title: Blitz Split
Metadata.description: The best way to split bills with friends
Metadata.keywords: split, bills, friends, expenses, group, share, experiences

GroupInviteLink.title: Join the {groupName} group on Blitz Split!
GroupInviteLink.description: Join the group and start sharing bills and experiences with {invitedFor}!

LandingPageWelcome.title: The best way to split bills with friends
LandingPageWelcome.description: Start sharing experiences in a simple and intuitive way with the power of Gemini! Don't forget to <sendReport>report your experiences!</sendReport>

LandingPageHowToPayDebt.title: How to Pay a Debt?
LandingPageHowToPayDebt.card1Description: When you have active bills, they will be available for payment.

LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.title: How to Create a Debt?
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card1Description: Within Blitz Split, you can create groups where you and your friends' expenses will be concentrated.
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card2Description: When you create a group, you can invite your friends to join.
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card3Description: Now just register your bills to split between the group participants in the way you prefer!

PrivacyPolicy.title: "Blitz Split" App Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.developer: Quare Software ("us", "we", or "our") developed the "Blitz Split" mobile application ("App"). This Privacy Policy is intended to inform you about what information we collect, how we use it, who we share it with, and what your rights are regarding this information when you use our App.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollection-description: We collect information about you in a variety of ways when you use the App. This information may include:
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollection-directInformation-: a) Information You Provide Directly to Us:

Account Information: When you create an account on the App, you provide us with information such as your username, email address, and password. You may also choose to provide additional information, such as your profile picture and phone number.

User Content: When using the App, you may provide information about your payment methods, including brazilian pix, bank details, cryptocurrency wallets, your expenses, including description, amount, date, and participants.
Communications: If you contact us directly, we may collect information such as your name, email address, phone number, and the content of your message.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollection-automaticInformati: Usage Information: We collect information about how you use the App, such as the features you access, the features you use, and how often you use the App.
Device Information: We collect information about your device, such as the operating system, hardware model, IP address, unique device identifier, and other device identifiers.
Location Information: If you allow it, we may collect information about your location using GPS, Bluetooth, or Wi-Fi.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollection-thirdPartyInformat: c) Information We Collect from Third Parties:
We may receive information about you from third-party social media platforms if you choose to connect your account on the App to those platforms.
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-description: We use the information we collect about you for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-provideImproveApp: Provide and Improve the App: We use your information to provide and improve the functionality of the App, such as creating and managing groups, adding participants, recording expenses, and calculating the split of bills.
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-personalizeExperience: Personalize Your Experience: We may use your information to personalize your experience on the App, such as by displaying content and features relevant to you.
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-communicate: Communicate with You: We may use your information to send you communications relating to the App, such as service announcements, feature updates, and feedback requests.
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-protectRights: Protect Our Rights and the Rights of Others: We may use your information to protect our rights, the security of the App, and the safety of our users and third parties.
PrivacyPolicy.informationUse-complyLaws: Comply with Legal Obligations: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws and regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.informationSharing-description: We do not share your personal information with third parties except in the following circumstances:
PrivacyPolicy.informationSharing-withConsent: With Your Consent: We may share your information with third parties if you give us permission to do so.
PrivacyPolicy.informationSharing-withServiceProviders: With Our Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties who assist us in providing and improving the App, such as hosting, analytics, and marketing providers.
PrivacyPolicy.informationSharing-forLegalReasons: For Legal Reasons: We may disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or in response to a court order or subpoena.
PrivacyPolicy.informationSharing-protectOurRights: To Protect Our Rights: We may disclose your information to protect our rights, the security of the App, and the safety of our users and third parties.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-description: You have the following rights with respect to your personal information:
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-access: Access: You have the right to request access to the personal information we collect about you.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-correction: Correction: You have the right to request the correction of any personal information about you that is inaccurate.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-deletion: Deletion: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal information, except where we are legally required to retain it.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-opposition: Opposition: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-dataPortability: Data Portability: You have the right to receive a copy of your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyRights-exerciseRights: You may exercise any of these rights by contacting us through the contact information provided at the end of this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSecurity-description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the personal information we collect against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.
PrivacyPolicy.children-description: The App is not intended for use by people under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from people under the age of 18. If you become aware that a minor has provided us with personal information, please contact us and we will take reasonable steps to remove such information from our servers.
PrivacyPolicy.policyChanges-description: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time. If we make material changes, we will notify you by posting the revised Privacy Policy on the App. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Your continued use of the App following the posting of the revised Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such changes.
PrivacyPolicy.contact-description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at: <contactEmail>appborarachar@gmail.com</contactEmail>.
